welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Kanan, Japan! Get ready to experience the charming blend of traditional and modern culture in this beautiful city known for its stunning natural scenery, delicious food, and warm hospitality. Enjoy your stay and explore all that Kanan has to offer!"

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal for domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal for domestic flights.

wifi.note: Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1

terminals.name: Terminal 2

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport. No registration or password is required.
